channel.title: !port forward?
channel.description:
ok guys im not gunna lie im not a great java coder, im OK at it.
Ive made my server and edited it BUT NO MATTER WHAT I DO IT WILL NOT HOST! Ive turned off both firewalls (norton, and windows) ive gone into my router and portforwarded on port 43594-43594 base port 43594 and theres always error connecting to server
Im posting here as a last resort and i havent seen any others like this. for one on this computer im using wireless maybe a problem? I have a motorolla netopia router and the model is a 3347-02
DONT TELL ME SOMETHING LIKE NOOB YOU SUCK guys really i just want some serious answers for this is you need any more information on it post here.
*EDIT* I HAVE TEAMVIEWER IF ANYBODY COULD HELP ill check this post tommorow morning :)

item.title: !port forward?
item.dc:creator: @aro5000 aro5000
item.description:
@aro5000 wrote:

Yeah ive already tried it says error connecting to server when i say it wont I MEAN IT WILL NOT HOST FOR ANY REASON OR ANYBODY it connects to the local host’s like 0.0.0.0 and 127.0.0.1 but if you input anything else you get an error uhh any more ideas pl0x? ( Basically i dont think it has anything to do with the actual server or any files but my router )

Read full topic

item.title: !port forward?
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

No I’m not you might have port forwarded wrong. Try getting on with the ip it tells to at www.whatismyip.com

Read full topic
